ygData.subject: Re: enchanter q.
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I disagree with the Wizard statement. Yes, you will not deal as much damage, but I have seen Enchanters duel Wizards and kick their asses.  The Enchanter
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I disagree with the Wizard statement. Yes, you will not deal as much
damage, but I have seen Enchanters duel Wizards and kick their asses. The
Enchanter class is not about direct damage, it's about subtlety and avoiding
damage to you and your group.

Djar Lightbringer(Tarew Marr Server)
Servant of Light, Deliverer of the Truth to Norrath

>
> From: "Sloop" <antler@...>
>
> class for powergamers, because honestly, you will never be as strong as a
> wizard of the same level.
> -Sloop, Level 12 Human Enchanter
> Fennin Ro
